message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. It's a great deal!
Hi Alice, $200 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $180. This product is high-quality and worth the price.
Alice, I understand you want to get the best price for your product. I'm willing to pay $155 for it. If you can't meet that, I'll have to go with John's offer.
